mapper.insert: insert into turnback values( return_idx.nextval, #{order_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{pro_idx}, sysdate, NULL, NULL, #{return_reason}, NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT *FROM orders o JOIN order_pro op ON o.order_idx = op.order_idx JOIN member m ON o.user_idx=m.user_idx JOIN product p ON op.pro_idx = p.pro_idx JOIN turnback t ON o.order_idx = t.order_idx WHERE o.order_idx=op.order_idx and o.user_idx=m.user_idx and o.order_idx=t.order_idx and op.pro_idx=p.pro_idx and o.order_idx=#{order_idx} and op.pro_idx=#{pro_idx}
mapper.update: update turnback t set t.return_start_date = sysdate, t.return_end_date = sysdate+7, t.return_ok='Y' where t.order_idx=#{order_idx}
